description: External works to include, insertion of new riser to front and rear entrance steps to dwellinghouse, removal of existing and replacement of side elevation door and re-glaze of side window. Installation of security cameras, 1no to side elevation and 1no to front elevation. Internal works and alterations to the ground floor to the entrance, hall, inner hall and WC, including, to renovate tiling and brick work, new parquet to match, remove false ceiling to inner hall, new double door in non original wall between inner hall and scullery, refurbish flooring and remove modern cupboards. Kitchen and breakfast room, and utility room, to remove modern additions, enlarge opening between kitchen and scullery, new tiled floor and making good. Living room 1 and 2 all to be retained and refurbished. Works and alterations to the first floor to include, removal of false ceiling to inner hall, remove existing fittings, pipe work, wall tiling and remove modern partition and suspended ceiling, close modern doorway, to fit sanitary ware and repairs to floor tiling. Remove modern gas fires to bedrooms and re tile surroundings to fire place. General internal works to all floors include, removal of any redundant services and renew as necessary, paint stripped and reinstated, all floors refurbished, alterations to sloping eaves and make good and insulate, and make good all surfaces affected by works, to match
